page.title: 13Chapel
page.content: In the village of Wolvey there is a{ {BAPTIST CHAPEL.}It was built in 1784 and is situated off the main Coventry to Hinckley road in School Lane. Regular{SUNDAY SERVICES}are held there. About a hundred years ago there were so many members that a balcony had to be added in the Chapel,which meant it could hold over two hundred people.Since the end of the second world war numbers have dwindled to around fifteen. Mr.Davies, a Baptist {MINISTER}who comes from the nearby town of Bedworth, sometimes takes the services. A Committee runs the Chapel and members of the Committee have been connected with the Chapel all their lives. Mrs.Eunice Elliott remembers going to the Chapel{SUNDAY SCHOOL}as a girl over seventy years ago.The Sunday School still runs in a room above the main Chapel.
